Action.author: krw910
Action.body: Lets not remove the log, but move it to a lower logging level like Debug.

Action.author: seanbohan_sovrin
Action.body: If Mike is happy we are happy. The question is, is ~krw910 happy?

Action.author: esplinr
Action.body: Mike and Kelly say that the current logging is much better. Some problems still need to be addressed, but will be raised as separate issues.
